00001 #include <cxxtest/TestSuite.h>

00003 #include "../munkres.h"

00005 class SingleSolutionTestSuite : public CxxTest::TestSuite {
00006 public:
00007         void testSingleSolution5by5( void ) {
00008                 for ( int i = 0 ; i < 10 ; i++ ) {
00009                         Matrix<double> mat = generateRandomMatrix(5, 5);
00010                         Munkres m;
00011                         m.solve(mat);
00012                         isSingleSolution(mat);
00013                 }
00014         }
00015 
00016         void testSingleSolution10by10( void ) {
00017                 for ( int i = 0 ; i < 10 ; i++ ) {
00018                         Matrix<double> mat = generateRandomMatrix(10, 10);
00019                         Munkres m;
00020                         m.solve(mat);
00021                         isSingleSolution(mat);
00022                 }
00023         }
00024

00027                         Matrix<double> mat = generateRandomMatrix(50, 50);
00028                         Munkres m;

00030                         isSingleSolution(mat);
00031                 }

00044                 for ( int i = 0 ; i < 10 ; i++ ) {
00045                         Matrix<double> mat = generateRandomMatrix(200, 200);
00046                         Munkres m;
00047                         m.solve(mat);
00048                         isSingleSolution(mat);
00049                 }
00050         }

00052         void isSingleSolution(Matrix<double> matrix) {
00053                 for ( int row = 0 ; row < matrix.rows() ; row++ ) {
00054                         int columnsolutioncount = 0;
00055                         for ( int col = 0 ; col < matrix.columns() ; col++ )
00056                                 if ( matrix(row,col) == 0 )
00057                                         columnsolutioncount++;
00058 
00059                                         
00060                         TS_ASSERT_EQUALS ( columnsolutioncount, 1 );
00061                 }
00062 
00063                 for ( int col = 0 ; col < matrix.columns() ; col++ ) {
00064                         int rowsolutioncount = 0;
00065                         for ( int row = 0 ; row < matrix.rows() ; row++ )
00066                                 if ( matrix(row,col) == 0 )
00067                                         rowsolutioncount++;
00068                                         
00069                         TS_ASSERT_EQUALS ( rowsolutioncount, 1 );
00070                 }
00071         }
00072         
00073         Matrix<double> generateRandomMatrix(int nrows, int ncols) {
00074                 Matrix<double> matrix(nrows, ncols);
00075         
00076                 srandom(time(NULL)); // Seed random number generator.
00077 
00078                 // Initialize matrix with random values.
00079                 for ( int row = 0 ; row < matrix.rows() ; row++ )
00080                         for ( int col = 0 ; col < matrix.columns() ; col++ )
00081                                 matrix(row,col) = (double)random();
00082                 
00083                 return matrix;
00084         }
00085 };
